thread.title: Lynn for Esther
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Lynn for Esther

author: Lynn for Esther
title: Lynn for Esther
text: I'm a repeat customer trying to help my mom hear better. We've had to ask customer service for a lot of explanations and assistance as we try to figure out the best, most cost-effective microphones, inductive neck loops and other small devices. I just wish someone would invent a SMALL wireless microphone device that could handle multiple speaking voices coming to one person trying to hear. Picture a game of bridge with 4 players, one being very hard-of-hearing. I wish the other 3 could wear a wireless lapel microphone that all feed into the same receiver without cords running all over the place.
